verses.verse: Then <S%H475>Eliashib<s%> the <S%H1419>high<s%> <S%H3548>priest<s%> rose <S%H6965>up<s%> with his <S%H251>brethren<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%>, and they <S%H1129>builded<s%> the <S%H6629>sheep<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%>; they <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> it, and set <S%H5975>up<s%> the <S%H1817>doors<s%> of it; even unto the <S%H4026>tower<s%> of <S%H3968>Meah<s%> they <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> it, unto the <S%H4026>tower<s%> of <S%H2606>Hananeel<s%>.
And next unto <S%H3027>him<s%> <S%H1129>builded<s%> the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H3405>Jericho<s%>. And next to them <S%H1129>builded<s%> <S%H2139>Zaccur<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H566>Imri<s%>.

But the <S%H1709>fish<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> did the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5570>Hassenaah<s%> <S%H1129>build<s%>, who also laid the <S%H7136>beams<s%> thereof, and set <S%H5975>up<s%> the <S%H1817>doors<s%> thereof, the <S%H4514>locks<s%> thereof, and the <S%H1280>bars<s%> thereof.

And next unto <S%H3027>them<s%> <S%H2388>repaired<s%> <S%H4822>Meremoth<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H223>Urijah<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6976>Koz<s%>. And next unto <S%H3027>them<s%> <S%H2388>repaired<s%> <S%H4918>Meshullam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1296>Berechiah<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4898>Meshezabeel<s%>. And next unto <S%H3027>them<s%> <S%H2388>repaired<s%> <S%H6659>Zadok<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1195>Baana<s%>.

And next unto <S%H3027>them<s%> the <S%H8621>Tekoites<s%> <S%H2388>repaired<s%>; but their <S%H117>nobles<s%> <S%H935>put<s%> not their <S%H6677>necks<s%> to the <S%H5656>work<s%> of their <S%H113>Lord<s%>.

Moreover the <S%H3465>old<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H2388>repaired<s%> <S%H3111>Jehoiada<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6454>Paseah<s%>, and <S%H4918>Meshullam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1152>Besodeiah<s%>; they laid the <S%H7136>beams<s%> thereof, and set <S%H5975>up<s%> the <S%H1817>doors<s%> thereof, and the <S%H4514>locks<s%> thereof, and the <S%H1280>bars<s%> thereof.

And next unto <S%H3027>them<s%> <S%H2388>repaired<s%> <S%H4424>Melatiah<s%> the <S%H1393>Gibeonite<s%>, and <S%H3036>Jadon<s%> the <S%H4824>Meronothite<s%>, the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H1391>Gibeon<s%>, and of <S%H4709>Mizpah<s%>, unto the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of the <S%H6346>governor<s%> on this <S%H5676>side<s%> the <S%H5104>river<s%>.

Next unto <S%H3027>him<s%> <S%H2388>repaired<s%> <S%H5816>Uzziel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2736>Harhaiah<s%>, of the <S%H6884>goldsmiths<s%>. Next unto <S%H3027>him<s%> also <S%H2388>repaired<s%> <S%H2608>Hananiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of one of the <S%H7546>apothecaries<s%>, and they <S%H5800>fortified<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> unto the <S%H7342>broad<s%> <S%H2346>wall<s%>.

And next unto <S%H3027>them<s%> <S%H2388>repaired<s%> <S%H7509>Rephaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2354>Hur<s%>, the <S%H8269>ruler<s%> of the <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H6418>part<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.

And next unto <S%H3027>them<s%> <S%H2388>repaired<s%> <S%H3042>Jedaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2739>Harumaph<s%>, even over against his <S%H1004>house<s%>. And next unto <S%H3027>him<s%> <S%H2388>repaired<s%> <S%H2407>Hattush<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2813>Hashabniah<s%>.

<S%H4441>Malchijah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2766>Harim<s%>, and <S%H2815>Hashub<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6355>Pahath-moab<s%>, <S%H2388>repaired<s%> the <S%H8145>other<s%> <S%H4060>piece<s%>, and the <S%H4026>tower<s%> of the <S%H8574>furnaces<s%>.

And next unto <S%H3027>him<s%> <S%H2388>repaired<s%> <S%H7967>Shallum<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3873>Halohesh<s%>, the <S%H8269>ruler<s%> of the <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H6418>part<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, he and his <S%H1323>daughters<s%>.

The <S%H1516>valley<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H2388>repaired<s%> <S%H2586>Hanun<s%>, and the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H2182>Zanoah<s%>; they <S%H1129>built<s%> it, and set <S%H5975>up<s%> the <S%H1817>doors<s%> thereof, the <S%H4514>locks<s%> thereof, and the <S%H1280>bars<s%> thereof, and a <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> on the <S%H2346>wall<s%> unto the <S%H830>dung<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%>.

But the <S%H830>dung<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H2388>repaired<s%> <S%H4441>Malchiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7394>Rechab<s%>, the <S%H8269>ruler<s%> of <S%H6418>part<s%> of <S%H1021>Beth-haccerem<s%>; he <S%H1129>built<s%> it, and set <S%H5975>up<s%> the <S%H1817>doors<s%> thereof, the <S%H4514>locks<s%> thereof, and the <S%H1280>bars<s%> thereof.

But the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H5869>fountain<s%> <S%H2388>repaired<s%> <S%H7968>Shallun<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3626>Col-hozeh<s%>, the <S%H8269>ruler<s%> of <S%H6418>part<s%> of <S%H4709>Mizpah<s%>; he <S%H1129>built<s%> it, and <S%H2926>covered<s%> it, and set <S%H5975>up<s%> the <S%H1817>doors<s%> thereof, the <S%H4514>locks<s%> thereof, and the <S%H1280>bars<s%> thereof, and the <S%H2346>wall<s%> of the <S%H1295>pool<s%> of <S%H7975>Siloah<s%> by the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H1588>garden<s%>, and unto the <S%H4609>stairs<s%> that go <S%H3381>down<s%> from the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>.

<S%H310>After<s%> him <S%H2388>repaired<s%> <S%H5166>Nehemiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5802>Azbuk<s%>, the <S%H8269>ruler<s%> of the <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H6418>part<s%> of <S%H1049>Beth-zur<s%>, unto the place over against the <S%H6913>sepulchres<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>, and to the <S%H1295>pool<s%> that was <S%H6213>made<s%>, and unto the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H1368>mighty<s%>.

<S%H310>After<s%> him <S%H2388>repaired<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>, <S%H7348>Rehum<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1137>Bani<s%>. Next unto <S%H3027>him<s%> <S%H2388>repaired<s%> <S%H2811>Hashabiah<s%>, the <S%H8269>ruler<s%> of the <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H6418>part<s%> of <S%H7084>Keilah<s%>, in his <S%H6418>part<s%>.

<S%H310>After<s%> him <S%H2388>repaired<s%> their <S%H251>brethren<s%>, <S%H942>Bavai<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2582>Henadad<s%>, the <S%H8269>ruler<s%> of the <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H6418>part<s%> of <S%H7084>Keilah<s%>.

And next to <S%H3027>him<s%> <S%H2388>repaired<s%> <S%H5829>Ezer<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3442>Jeshua<s%>, the <S%H8269>ruler<s%> of <S%H4709>Mizpah<s%>, <S%H8145>another<s%> <S%H4060>piece<s%> over against the going <S%H5927>up<s%> to the <S%H5402>armoury<s%> at the <S%H4740>turning<s%> of the wall.

<S%H310>After<s%> him <S%H1263>Baruch<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2079>Zabbai<s%> <S%H2734>earnestly<s%> <S%H2388>repaired<s%> the <S%H8145>other<s%> <S%H4060>piece<s%>, from the <S%H4740>turning<s%> of the wall unto the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H475>Eliashib<s%> the <S%H1419>high<s%> <S%H3548>priest<s%>.

<S%H310>After<s%> him <S%H2388>repaired<s%> <S%H4822>Meremoth<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H223>Urijah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6976>Koz<s%> <S%H8145>another<s%> <S%H4060>piece<s%>, from the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H475>Eliashib<s%> even to the <S%H8503>end<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H475>Eliashib<s%>.
And <S%H310>after<s%> him <S%H2388>repaired<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%>, the <S%H582>men<s%> of the <S%H3603>plain<s%>.

<S%H310>After<s%> him <S%H2388>repaired<s%> <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> and <S%H2815>Hashub<s%> over against their <S%H1004>house<s%>. <S%H310>After<s%> him <S%H2388>repaired<s%> <S%H5838>Azariah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4641>Maaseiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6055>Ananiah<s%> <S%H681>by<s%> his <S%H1004>house<s%>.

<S%H310>After<s%> him <S%H2388>repaired<s%> <S%H1131>Binnui<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2582>Henadad<s%> <S%H8145>another<s%> <S%H4060>piece<s%>, from the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H5838>Azariah<s%> unto the <S%H4740>turning<s%> of the wall, even unto the <S%H6438>corner<s%>.

<S%H6420>Palal<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H186>Uzai<s%>, over against the <S%H4740>turning<s%> of the wall, and the <S%H4026>tower<s%> which lieth <S%H3318>out<s%> from the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H5945>high<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>, that was by the <S%H2691>court<s%> of the <S%H4307>prison<s%>. <S%H310>After<s%> him <S%H6305>Pedaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6551>Parosh<s%>.

Moreover the <S%H5411>Nethinims<s%> <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in <S%H6077>Ophel<s%>, unto the place over against the <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> toward the <S%H4217>east<s%>, and the <S%H4026>tower<s%> that lieth <S%H3318>out<s%>.

<S%H310>After<s%> them the <S%H8621>Tekoites<s%> <S%H2388>repaired<s%> <S%H8145>another<s%> <S%H4060>piece<s%>, over against the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4026>tower<s%> that lieth <S%H3318>out<s%>, even unto the <S%H2346>wall<s%> of <S%H6077>Ophel<s%>.
From above the <S%H5483>horse<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H2388>repaired<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%>, every <S%H376>one<s%> over <S%H5048>against<s%> his <S%H1004>house<s%>.

<S%H310>After<s%> them <S%H2388>repaired<s%> <S%H6659>Zadok<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H564>Immer<s%> over against his <S%H1004>house<s%>. <S%H310>After<s%> him <S%H2388>repaired<s%> also <S%H8098>Shemaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7935>Shechaniah<s%>, the <S%H8104>keeper<s%> of the <S%H4217>east<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%>.

<S%H310>After<s%> him <S%H2388>repaired<s%> <S%H2608>Hananiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8018>Shelemiah<s%>, and <S%H2586>Hanun<s%> the <S%H8345>sixth<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6764>Zalaph<s%>, <S%H8145>another<s%> <S%H4060>piece<s%>. <S%H310>After<s%> him <S%H2388>repaired<s%> <S%H4918>Meshullam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1296>Berechiah<s%> over against his <S%H5393>chamber<s%>.

<S%H310>After<s%> him <S%H2388>repaired<s%> <S%H4441>Malchiah<s%> the <S%H6885>goldsmith's<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> unto the <S%H1004>place<s%> of the <S%H5411>Nethinims<s%>, and of the <S%H7402>merchants<s%>, over against the <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H4663>Miphkad<s%>, and to the going <S%H5944>up<s%> of the <S%H6438>corner<s%>.
And between the going <S%H5944>up<s%> of the <S%H6438>corner<s%> unto the <S%H6629>sheep<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H2388>repaired<s%> the <S%H6884>goldsmiths<s%> and the <S%H7402>merchants<s%>.
